Description:
Followed up for shipment up-to the arrival and departure from warehouse.
Preparing the follow-up of the arrival and departure of the shipment from and to the warehouse.
Inspect each item before signing the receipt and also monitor the initial packing of the items before departure from the warehouse.
Supervising key performance indicators and generating achievement reports such that supplier agreements are followed.Skills
Skills:
Proficiency in the relevant management software programs.
Experience in networking and ability to efficiently manage time.
Must possess operational fluency in management software programs.
Outstanding verbal and written communication and negotiation skills are required.
